Container.Name: omegabrr
Container.Overview: This application has no WebUI, reference the readme at https://github.com/autobrr/omegabrr/blob/main/README.md for documentation on how to run this application.[br][br] [br][br] Omegabrr transforms monitored shows, movies, books and music from arrs into Autobrr filters. It also supports adding titles from custom lists to autobrr filters.
